about_the_game:
Built for speedrunners and adrenaline addicts, TIRELESS is a challenging racing platformer that prioritizes high-speed and skill-based gameplay. Master movement and evade obstacles at extreme speeds. Easy to pick up but challenging to master, the game offers a thrilling experience, relying solely on your expertise to conquer each handcrafted level. Enjoy seamless gameplay with responsive controls and complete freedom of movement, offering a truly off-the-rails experience.

CONTENT

  • An elaborate tutorial level.

  • Fully hand-crafted levels.

  • All official soundtracks.

  • 10+ language translations for all the in-game text.

  • Full audio narration in any of the available languages within the tutorial level.

  • 4 selectable in-game difficulty options.

  • Controller support. The gamepad doesn't support navigation outside of the game in case the game launches web links.

DIFFICULTY

Experience non-stop, action-packed gameplay from the get-go without interruptions from storylines or dialogue. Test your skills across difficulty options, ranging from accessible for casual players to brutally challenging for the daring. Beat each level multiple times to climb the ranks and set new high scores.

AUDIO

Experience an adrenaline-fueled journey with over 10 distinct electronic music tracks tailored for each level. These high-quality soundtracks perfectly synchronize with the game's pace, enhancing the immersive gameplay experience.

LOCALIZATION

TIRELESS is a global adventure, localized in over 10 languages including voiced narration.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

ABOUT THE DEVELOPER

Hi there! I'm Naro. I'm a solo developer working on TIRELESS since July of 2017. I gained most of my game dev experience and understanding through working on TIRELESS as it is one of my first game projects. I wanted to become a game developer since I was 13, and at 18 I started working on TIRELESS, a project that has enabled me to fulfill this dream. The game was heavily influenced by my childhood games like Sonic, Crash, Spyro, and other 3D platformers of the time, since back then, that was my favorite genre of games. Later down the line, the game took inspiration from racing games, especially antigravity racing games like Wipeout and Redout as well as movement games like Warframe. TIRELESS wasn't pre-planned, but inspirations came as I worked on the project and over the years it has formed into a game I'm proud to call my own.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6500 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 Super for 1080p/2K or RTX 3080 for 4K
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Developer's Setup: Processor - 11th Gen Intel Core i7-11700K 3.60GHz. GPU: GeForce RTX 2060 Super 8GB VRAM.

short_description: Crafted by a solo developer - an ultimate fast-paced experience that embraces high-speed gameplay with utmost dedication. Encounter exhilarating velocities and push your skills to the limit with TIRELESS!
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, Ukrainian*, Croatian*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
